descriptionHtml:
``````````````
INTRODUCTION           IF U LIKE DONT FORGET TO INDORSE AND LEAVE COMMENTS ON IDEAS
``````````````

This Mod Adds a \"New\" Skin Tone To the Argonain Characters of the Game Its a \"MidNight Black \" Shinny Skin tone to to Both femal And male argonains\" SEE PICS \" . this also includes my \" Blood\" eyes \"NEW\" Colour As well. All these add up to make the argonian character feel more EVIL.

```````````````````````````````````````````
UPDATES TO COME WITH MORE SKINTONES
```````````````````````````````````````````
I plan on updating this mod daily with new and enproved Skintones And Eye Tones. So keep ur eys out for theses Updates

